00005 BEHAVIOR_STATUS RepeatNode::execute(void* agent)
00006 {
00007         if (children.size()== 0)
00008                 return BT_SUCCESS;
00009         else
00010         {
00011                 BEHAVIOR_STATUS status = children.at(0)->execute(agent);
00012                 if (status == BT_SUCCESS)
00013                 {
00014                         count++;
00015                         if (count == target && target!= -1)
00016                         {
00017                                 init(agent);
00018                                 return BT_SUCCESS;
00019                         }
00020                         else
00021                                 return BT_RUNNING;
00022                 }
00023                 return status;
00024         }
00025 }

00027 void BehaviorTree::RepeatNode::init( void* agent )
00028 {
00029         count = 0;
00030         if (children.size() == 1)
00031                 children.at(0)->init(agent);
00032 }

00034 BehaviorTreeInternalNode* BehaviorTree::RepeatNode::addChild( BehaviorTreeNode* newChild )
00035 {
00036         assert(children.size() == 0);
00037         BehaviorTreeInternalNode::addChild(newChild);
00038         return this;
